mapper.sql: select comment_no, user_id, movie_title, reply, rating, parent_comment_id, comment_create_date, comment_update_date ,comment_delete from Comments
mapper.select: select comment_no, user_id, movie_title, reply, rating, parent_comment_id, comment_create_date, comment_update_date ,comment_delete from Comments order by comment_create_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into Comments(comment_no, user_id, movie_title, reply) values (seq_comment_no.nextval, #{user_id}, #{movie_title}, #{reply})
